txt.en: You have completed Throne of the Dread Terror: The Returned King
You have completed 'The Abyss of Mordath: The Order of Death'.
You have completed 'The Abyss of Mordath: A Light in the Darkness'.

Determined to wield the lost Ring of Power Manthríf once more, King Váskmun Greytooth has led his Firehorn Dwarves into the Abyss of Mordath, where the sunken foundations of Barad-dûr now rest. Meanwhile, the Order of the Eye has made haste to pursue the Firehorns, eager to avenge their fallen and contest the dwarves' claim to the greatest artifacts of the Dark Lord. Unbeknownst to any of them, greater still are the terrors Sauron hid away in the shadows of the Mordath.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 of the Abyss of Mordath raid.</rgb>
You have completed 'The Abyss of Mordath: The Power of the Dwarf-rings'.
You have completed Throne of the Dread Terror: Unbound Corruption
You have completed Throne of the Dread Terror: Calm of Death
Complete Throne of the Dread Terror: The Returned King

Determined to wield the lost Ring of Power Manthríf once more, King Váskmun Greytooth has led his Firehorn Dwarves into the Abyss of Mordath, where the sunken foundations of Barad-dûr now rest. Meanwhile, the Order of the Eye has made haste to pursue the Firehorns, eager to avenge their fallen and contest the dwarves' claim to the greatest artifacts of the Dark Lord. Unbeknownst to any of them, greater still are the terrors Sauron hid away in the shadows of the Mordath.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 of the Abyss of Mordath raid.</rgb>
